title: On the Hamiltonian for the Hilbert-P\'olya Conjecture
abstract:
In a recent manuscript~[J. Phys. A: Math. Theor. 57 235204 (2024)], a
candidate Hamiltonian for the Hilbert-P\'olya Conjecture was introduced. Here,
we elegantly demonstrate that the corresponding eigenfunctions are
square-integrable and, crucially, that the eigenvalues are real. The latter
represents a significant step toward proving the Riemann Hypothesis.
